list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an overflowing of a large amount of water beyond its normal confines, especially over what is normally dry land.
an outpouring of tears or emotion.
cover or submerge (a place or area) with water.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đập đập, tràn ngập một thị trấn nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: arrive in overwhelming amounts or quantities.
